explains: adj. 宇宙论的；宇宙哲学的

sentences.en: The world lines modeled the cosmological arrow.
sentences.cn: “世界线”代表了宇宙箭头的模型。

sentences.en: With another roll of the cosmological dice the world's language would be Tagalog.
sentences.cn: 如果再掷一次宇宙骰子，世界语言可能会是塔加拉族语。

sentences.en: Locke thought that you could prove the existence of God by a sort of cosmological argument.
sentences.cn: 洛克认为，可以通过一种宇宙论来证明上帝的存在。
